title: (33800) Cangas del Narcea - 10 Calle Uría
description: Self-service laundry, open all year from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

title: (33800) Cangas del Narcea - 11 Avenida del Barrio Nuevo
title_short: (33800) Cangas del Narcea - 11 Avenida del Barrio Nuevo
description: Parking next to the river and the center. Better than the area. Cars and motorhomes. It has no services

title: (33800) Cangas del Narcea - 19 Avenida de Oviedo
title_short: (33800) Cangas del Narcea - 19 Avenida de Oviedo
description: Two specific places for motorhomes in this car park. All the services. Near the center of town, next to the river and a pedestrian path. For max. 72h

title: (33819) Cangas del Narcea - 1021 CN-1
description: Very cool water fountain. Visibly consumed by local residents.

title: (33819) L'Acebu -
description: Large space near the Acebo hamlet (sanctuary) and 400m from a small restaurant bar (Del Rio) open all year round. Very nice view, calm ... at an altitude of 1200m.

title: (33889) Villavaser - 101 Lugar Figueras
description: Beautiful recreational area with picnic tables and a snack bar. Lots of shade. Easy access. Fit 4 motorhomes. We had a very quiet night.

title: (33814) Santiago de Peñas -
description:
Region with few places to spend the night.
so I suggest this old road, wedged between a precipice and a cliff.
the river that passes below is not very accessible and very cool, the bravest can swim there.
the location is quiet, a few bikes pass by.
stayed 24 hours, no feeling that stones could fall, it should only take place in freeze/thaw periods. Everyone has to take their responsibilities.

title: (33889) Pola de Allande - 3 Calle de las Veigas
title_short: (33889) Pola de Allande - 3 Calle de las Veigas
description: Gorgeous recreation area with a large parking lot right next door. During the summer months the municipal swimming pool and the Chiringuito are open. There is a fountain with drinking water in the middle of the recreation area

title: (33880) Pola de Allande - 6 Calle el Hortilde
title_short: (33880) Pola de Allande - 6 Calle el Hortilde
description: Parking enabled for long vehicles

title: (33889) Pola de Allande - 5A Barrio los Solares
title_short: (33889) Pola de Allande - 5A Barrio los Solares
description: Very close to the center, commercial services. Pitches 5m long.

title: (33811) Posada de Rengos -
description: Recreation area with a small car park next to the church. Enough to make a rest stop and to park and do the hiking trail that leaves the town. Fountain and garbage containers.

title: (33876) Tineo - 3 AS-15
description: Area with picnic tables at the foot of the road with a bar in front. Lake views. great for eating

title: (33818) La Chabola -
description: Semi-hidden siding next to the road of the port of Leitariegos. Quiet to spend the night. Almost no traffic on a Sunday in August (20-25 cars all night). Pretty flat. Fit 3-4 vans and / or AC. Spectacular views.

title: (33811) Cangas del Narcea - 27 Moal
description: Parking area in the village of Moal next to the beginning of the Moal Woods hiking trail next to Muniellos. Very quiet area next to the river. Ideal for spending the night. Narrow entrance for large motorhomes.

title: (33888) Montefurado - AS-14
description: Pitch at the top of the pass, spectacular place, but it is forbidden to stay overnight in the whole region

title: (33811) Cangas del Narcea - AS-348
description: Parking lot of Muniellos information center with picnic tables that are sheltered from rain. During the opening hours of the center you can use the toilets, too. (Roughly 10-20h) We asked one of the staff and they said it was okay to stay for the night. The ground is not even, though. Nice views of the valley and hiking nearby.

title: (33817) Cangas del Narcea - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the road but with very little traffic.

title: (33842) - Unnamed Road
description: Small place on the side of the road, flat, calm, at night a single car passes by

title: (33888) Asturias - AS-364
description: At the edge of almost no traffic, almost flat grass area, great view, very windy corner.

title: (33876) Tuña - 72A Lugar a Tu
description: It is the sports court of the beautiful town of Tuña, an exemplary town of Asturias in the year 2000. This place is used as a general rule for sporting events and outside of them, which is most of the time for car and van parking. waiting for the ac area that is projected right in front to be built. The land is paved and completely level, it is inside the town but not right in the center, secluded but connected and has beautiful views of the Asturian mountains. From this point we have access to all kinds of mountain routes on foot and by bicycle, not in vain, Tuña is part of the Gravity Zone BTT Center and there are also multiple sites of cultural interest, such as the birthplace of Riego, the Merilles dolmen and numerous palatial houses. Tuña is also one of the towns with the most hórreos and bread baskets in Asturias. Undoubtedly a haven of peace, but if you want to eat, dine or have a drink, you have the Casa Pipo Restaurant where motorhome drivers are very well received.

title: () - AS-14
description: If you have had the crazy idea to take the beautiful mountain road between Lugo and Oviedo, you can rest and spend the night on this flat roadside. Place for 4 motorhomes. Rare circulation. Very beautiful view.

title: (33876) Tuña - 11 Tuña
description: RECREATIONAL AREA OF TUÑA Location: Located in the town of Tuña, near the road that leads to Genestaza, on the banks of the Faxeirúa River. Information: Hiking (Route to the Dolmen de Merillés and the Natural Trail of the Cantabrian Mountains), fountain, parking area, barbecue and tables. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Visit town of Tuña: interesting architectural complex. - Start of routes. - BTT routes.

title: (33811) Gedrez -
description: Area and Parking for Motorhomes and Vans that belongs to the Restaurant, Bar-Shop Funsiquin, located in Xedré (Cangas del Narcea, Asturias) a mountain town at 700m. of altitude. In the Fuentes del Narcea, Degaña and Ibias Natural Park, near the Muniellos Forest, spaces classified as a Biosphere Reserve by UNESCO. Call before going call us because in summer there may be some event in the motorhome parking and it would not be available to park. Thank you!

title: (33886) Lago - 14A Lugar Lago
description: A grassy area along an agricultural road, several possible locations, the place is quiet away from the main road, beautiful view of the wind farm of Puerto del Palo.

title: (33842) Villar de Vildas - 44 Calle Villar de Vildas
title_short: (33842) Villar de Vildas - 44 Calle Villar de Vildas
description: The closest parking to Villar de Vildas accessible for motorhomes is this, since within the town it is impossible to drive with AC. It is a plain next to the road, very quiet and 1 km from the center.

title: (33887) Berducedo - AS-34
description: Area recreativa Berducedo Space for 2 to 3 vehicles on a solid surface at the side of the road. Almost zero traffic. Great view. Several legal barbecue areas. Faucet worked. Well maintained.

title: (33874) Tineo - Unnamed Road
description: At 800m from the main road (where there are several possible locations on the grass overlooking the 2 valleys), small narrow and stony path but flat (ok in Van up to 7m if you are good in half turn, not in motorhomes, and in 4x4 we must be able to climb higher on a ridge) with a location in a bend. Very quiet, at the end of the road there seems to be a sheepfold. East Expo. Requires 2 holds to be flat without encroaching on the way. Windy corner like all this region near Galicia .. There is another possible reversal at the crossing of 2 paths further.

title: (33843) - AS-227
description: Auxiliary road to the highway, place for a van or car, flat, route crossing, source 200m down the road. Very calm

title: (33870) Tineo - 1A Calle Santa Teresa
description: Fairground with the possibility of staying overnight as long as there is no fair or exhibition on site. I asked at the tourist office and the local police, without problems

title: (33814) Valvaler - AS-34
description:
Right at the pass, 20 meters on the dirt road to the
side of the sleeve for cattle.
Solitary and with spectacular views.

title: (33870) Tineo - 10D Carretera Oviedo
description: A very quiet parking next to the Tineo clinic, ideal for spending the night

title: (33870) Tineo - 42T Calle del Viso
description: Service area, maximum authorized parking 72 hours.

title: (33870) Tineo - 114A Carretera de San Roque
description: One of the few level places to spend the night in Tineo. You can change the waters in the nearby area but to spend the night it is better here.

title: (33836) Boinás - AS-310
description:
No service, no stamp. The only interest of this car park at the edge of a road with very little traffic and a river is to exist in this region little informed on park4night.
Slight drop but very acceptable if you sit upside down.
in the shade in the morning.

title: (33874) Collada - Unnamed Road
description: Flat public parking space in a small hamlet ... ideal starting point to ascend the Mulleiroso peak. In the town there is a fountain.

title: (33870) Tineo - 118A Carretera de San Roque
description: CAMPO DE SAN ROQUE RECREATIONAL AREA Location: Located in the vicinity of Villa de Tineo, in this field it is the place of leisure for the people of Tinet, as well as a place to celebrate their festivals. Data: Security zone, hiking (Camino de Santiago), bar / cafeteria, fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, tables and accessible coaches. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Campo de San Roque. - Camino Camino de Santiago Primitivo. - Paseo de los Frailes. - Monument to the pilgrim. - Tineo municipal swimming pools (summer).

title: (33870) Tineo - 120A Carretera de San Roque
description: Parking with picnic area. Lleugerament inclined, with 1 space completely flat. Bones you wear. Container d'escombraries and bar a l'aparcament d'abaix. Hi hem slept the nit of the said 9 de setembre i molta tranquility. I don't know if it's always a calm cry. Respect your entorn ...!

title: (33843) Belmonte de Miranda - 116A Lugar Almurfe
description: Along the road crossing a bridge, a rest area next to the river, for small vehicles there is a track to the mountains and you can walk along the river, without service.

title: (24111) Villablino - 1 Calle Leitariegos
description: No problem for the night, quiet area but no service

title: (33888) - AS-364
description: Place with incomparable views. At the foot of a wind farm. In the Alto de Bustantigo - about 1000 meters of altitude

title: (33840) Pola de Somiedo - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador de Aguino, place for about 5 vans, difficult climb to the site so I do not recommend it for AC, beautiful views of the surroundings and the town of Somiedo and a quiet place.

title: (33877) Tineo - Unnamed Road
description: EL ARENERO RECREATIONAL AREA Location: Located within the El Arenero Intensive Fishing Reserve, in the town of El Crucero - just 3 kilometers from the town of Tineo-. Information: Security area, bar / cafeteria, fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, barbecue, tables and accessible coaches. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - “El Arenero” Intensive Fishing Reserve. - Senda Tineo - El Crucero. (I spoke with the City Council and they provide us with parking and overnight in the entire Council) 3Km filling and emptying area)

title: (33840) Pola de Somiedo - AS-227
description: La Malva rest area, shade, two tables, fountain and space to park 6 or 7 vehicles. Exit of the "PR AS 13 Ruta de Castro". Stuck on the road.

title: (33879) Tineo - AS-359
description: RECREATIONAL AREA OF CASA L´PUERTO Location: Located in the Alto de la Casa de Puerto (1025 meters of altitude) from where you can see a part of the council of Tineo. Data: Security zone, panoramic point, fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, barbecue, tables and accessible coaches. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Panoramic point.

name: Somiedo Camper Park
title: (33840) Somiedo Camper Park
description:
Discover with your motorhome or van one of the most impressive natural jewels of the peninsula, the Somiedo Natural Park.

Feel in touch with nature in one of our large garden squares.

Somiedo Camper Park is located in the capital of Somiedo, one minute walk from the Plaza del Ayuntamiento with shops, museums, restaurants... just a few steps away.

name: Camping La Pomarada de Somiedo
title: (33840) Camping La Pomarada de Somiedo
description: Beautiful location in the middle of the cozy mountain village. The campsite itself is atmospheric. Sanitary facilities are mediocre. At night there is no lighting on the campsite and in the sanitary building. Good for a night.

title: (33812) Tablado - 63A Aldea Tablado
description: Recreational area of the town of Tablado. Perfect for an overnight stay.

title: (33812) - 36A Lugar Barrio los Tachos
description: Quiet area to spend the night. Level floor with enough space for any type of length.

title: (33812) Degaña - AS-212
description: Parking next to the road, somewhat secluded, the noise does not disturb anything. Beautiful views, several mountain routes start from this place. I do not know if any AC will be able to enter since there is a closure with limited width, ideal vans and camper.

title: (33812) -
description: Leisure area between the provinces of León and Asturias. Picnic and barbecue. Intention of the town hall to create a motorhome area in the future ... I hope they do!

title: (33812) Degaña - 36A Barrio los Castechones
description: Car park in Cerredo next to the Ibias river, a quiet and flat area next to the school and the doctor's office, a pleasant promenade with lampposts and wooden benches with tables. Incredible views of the mountain!!

title: (33879) Tineo - AS-15
description: RECREATIONAL AREA OF CASA L´PUERTO Location: Located in the Alto de la Casa de Puerto (1025 meters of altitude) from where you can see a part of the council of Tineo. Data: Security zone, panoramic point, fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, barbecue, tables and accessible coaches. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Panoramic point.

title: (33812) Degaña - 14 Carretera General-Tablado
description: Motorhome area under construction, at the time it will have the normal services, for the moment I can spend the night, which is not little. In this town there is everything, what is needed to spend a few days of tranquility and health....

title: (33812) Degaña - 8A Carretera General-Tablado
description: Free sports center parking. Very quiet to spend the night, although the road is close it is not very busy. The squares are not level.

title: (27113) Grandas de Salime - Unnamed Road
description: Find this perfect spot in the middle of the mountains, overlooking the green valley and its blue river. Remote enough to be utterly quiet and see millions of stars come out at night. The place is right between Ernes and Escanlar. Make sure to avoid the dirt roads, there are tarmacked roads that will give you easy access. There are many interesting towns and villages to visit along the way. This area is ideal for hiking.

title: (33812) Degaña - Camino de la Fábrica
description: Recreational area secluded from the town of Degaña, with access by narrow road (Not suitable for motorhomes). There are tables and drinking water, and above all there is a covered area for rainy days.

title: (33873) Tineo - TI-8
description: Parking and services in the small town of Navelgas. Location of a gold museum.

title: (33730) Grandas de Salime - GS-1
description: Pénjamo, the road dies in the water of the Salime reservoir. A secluded and overwhelming place, ideal to spend the night and enjoy the calm, the oar or a good swim in its calm waters.

title: (33735) Asturias - 20A Aldea Sanzo
description: Navia Historical Park. Abandoned village with a superb view of el rio Navia. Quiet corner 6km from Grandas de Salime where you can find superb burgers at Jaime's café. Only small downside large high voltage line, but can be noisy.

title: (33873) Navelgas - 130A Calle la Ferreria
description: NAVELGAS RECREATIONAL AREA Location: Located in the immediate vicinity of the Huella del Oro Route and the bowling alley. Information: Security zone, hiking (the Huella del Oro Route), fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, children's area, barbecue, tables and accessible coaches to the entrance ramp. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Visit town of Navelgas. - Start of routes. - Asturias Gold Museum and gold batting workshop.

title: () Illano - BO-3
description: Area with stone tables with very good views, very quiet and flat to sleep in the van. Without water or light, only the mountain (and an electric tower that does not disturb some of the views)

title: (33730) Grandas de Salime - AS-14
description: Picnic area with fountain. Not much space to park

title: (33717) Villayón - Unnamed Road
description: By 1km of stony track but almost flat since the Alto de Branuas pass to the south (it passes Van 4x2 not too low, no particular difficulty), space at the intersection of 3 tracks to park a vehicle of max 6m but narrow for do not obstruct the passage. Small pass with nice view East and West, given the wind turbines a few km is probably often windy. Very calm. Altitude 836m.

title: (33840) Veigas - 49A Camino las Veigas
description:
Small car park with no marked spaces between the road (with little traffic) and a small river (which makes a bit of noise).

 Perfect for visiting the nearby eco-museum and taking a walk around the town.

As of 08/20/2023 there is no sign that prohibits staying overnight.

title: (33840) La Peral - Aldea La Peral
description: Very nice area but the caravan, van and any vehicle that can sleep in it is not well received. They warned me that the entire area included the population is park and you cannot stay overnight.

title: (33730) Grandas de Salime - 2A Calle Pedro de Pedre
title_short: (33730) Grandas de Salime - 2A Calle Pedro de Pedre
description: Motorhome area, operational since October 2015. As of June 14, 2020 the tap is still broken. Thanks anyway to this City Council for this AC Area, well signposted and located

title: (33840) La Peral -
description: Zona al lado de la carretera, caben unos 5 coches, está nivelada. Bonitas vistas y poco ruido.

title: (33730) Os Vales - Barrio los Valles, 5A
description: Recreational area in Os Valles, next to the Fire Station and 1 km from the town of Grandas de Salime. It has tables and a grill and a drinking fountain. Small parking but motorhomes fit, although it is somewhat uneven. The town is very beautiful with different places to visit. I recommend: Ethnographic Museum, the waterfall (or Grandas reservoir) with its viewpoints, the abandoned town of A Paiceiga (from the area towards Santa María and detour to Sanzo), sourdough bread from the town bakery.

title: (27113) - Unnamed Road
description: Place for camper vans. Next to a chapel. Overlooking the reservoir. Silent, because you can't hear more than the wind. There are a couple of barcacoas and several tables. And also two faucets for water.

title: (33840) Asturias - AS-227
description: Small parking spot off road with picnic table.

title: (33111) Campiello - AS-265
description: Parking day and night at the top of the pass

title: (24110) Caboalles de Abajo - 19 Carretera Ponferr-Espina-Co
description: Esplanade practically with the firm plain, it is used by the town to celebrate its festivals... We spent 2 nights. Pretty quiet place. 15 minutes from the Leitariegos ski resort. No services.

title: (33839) Ondes -
description: It is forbidden to leave residues of any kind. No toilet paper please. It is an impeccable and clean meadow on a hill. 4km uphill to get there from Belmonte. Absolutely quiet, bucolic and pastoral. No service or water. Just peace.

title: (33830) Belmonte - 3A Avenida Río Pigüeña
description: Parking next to the municipal pool and with bars and shops around. This is a parking area for residents of the apartments. Didn't realise until we arrived. However, there were many empty spaces and (in October) we weren't asked to move. The river is right next to it, and you can sleep without problems. Nearby you will find bars, cafés and restaurants and the beginning of several hiking trails.

title: (33735) Pesoz - 88 Lugar Pesoz
description: Free parking at the entrance / exit of the town. Surrounded by nature, tables, benches and drinking water.

title: (33830) Belmonte - 11 Avenida Carretera del Puerto
description: Plain park next to sports facilities

title: (33735) Pesoz - 18 Aldea Argul
description: Quiet place at the entrance to Argul, a beautiful town. Surrounded by pine forest, without noise, in full contact with nature. Easy access, no installation at all

title: (33718) - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area "Las Virtudes" near Ponticiella, Villayón. Large flat parking next to the area, which has benches and a fountain next to the hermitage. Very calm.

name: Camping Lagos De Somiedo
title: (33840) Camping Lagos De Somiedo
description: Charming Camping in a stunning valley of the Somiedo natural park. Water hose to fill up, and electrical hook-up. Not recommended for large vehicles as the road up the valley is very narrow and windy.  Staff is friendly, there is a small bar with delicious local apple cider, laundromat available, showers, toilets, and a good spot to start horse excursions and hikes.

title: (33735) Cabanela -
description: A very beautiful place. Tables and chairs for barbecue. I slept one night. Near the garbage can. Please leave your place clean. Camping is prohibited.

title: (33845) - AS-227
description: Recreational area with a dozen tables and barbecues, sun and shade spaces between trees. next  to the road arriving at Belmonte and in the direction of Somiedo. No services except bins

title: (33869) Soto de los Infantes - 46 Lugar Soto de los Infantes
title_short: (33869) Soto de los Infantes - 46 Lugar Soto de los Infantes
description: Recreational area, with barbecues, picnic area, garbage containers and water source, on the river bank, very quiet.

title: (33840) Valle de Lago - 160A Calle Valle de Lago
title_short: (33840) Valle de Lago - 160A Calle Valle de Lago
description: Ideal place to spend the day and start the road to the valley lake, without service. Very nice view, small village 3 mins walk.

title: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - 47A Barrio Torgoal
title_short: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - 47A Barrio Torgoal
description: Parking of the Municipal Pool very quiet. Next to a caravan parking area, suitable for overnight stays with cars/beds. Fountain with water. Pool with hot showers.

title: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - 47A Barrio Torgoal
title_short: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - 47A Barrio Torgoal
description: The San Antolin de Ibias motorhome area is located in a natural environment, on the banks of Rio Ibias, near a beautiful recreational area with grills and near municipal swimming pools, open in summer season. From here there are some hiking routes and at 400 m you will find La Salle de la Nature and the Interpretation Center of La Palloza de San Antolin, the place where you will discover the lifestyles, traditions and ethnography of the area, as well as the flora and fauna of the Natural Park of Fountains of Narcea, Degaia and Ibias (biosphere reserve) and, if not, you can visit The Interpretation Center of La Palloza, traditional building with the green roof, in which people used to live Access: From the AS-15, in the village of the ruler, we will take the AS-29 and then take the AS-210 towards San Antolin de Ibias. Once in the village, follow signs to the recreation area and swimming pool. After crossing the bridge over the river Ibias, we turn left, continuing for 400 meters to the recreation area and pools, behind which is the parking area of ​​coaches.

title: (33840) Arbellales - 16A Lugar Arbeyales
description: Picnic area not 100% flat. Small garden with tables.

title: (27113) Pieiga -
description: Place near the road, several tables, fireplace, nice view

title: (33812) -
description: Picnic area. Perfect route for motorcycle route. "Nearby" San Antolín de ibias and degaña.

name: Laciana Natura campsite
title: (24112) Laciana Natura campsite
description: Laciana Natura campsite near Villablino, next to the Laciana greenway

title: (24140) Lumajo - 80 Calle Juan Caunedo
description: Parking at the end of the town. You can spend the night, although during the day there may be enough vehicles since it is the starting point of various routes. Anyway good views and quiet at night.

title: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - Barrio el Fojo
title_short: (33810) San Antolin de Ibias - Barrio el Fojo
description: Area motor homes next to the area of the village.

title: (33785) -
description: Parking on a soccer field. With containers. Few cars at night. From the car park there is a route to "foces del Esva." In the next town there is a menhir.

title: (33785) Longrey - 29 Lugar Longrey
description: Free parking where begins the route of Hoces del Esva. Quiet spot near the river with a bar nearby where they give meals.

title: (33739) Seoane -
description: Nice place with beautiful views. It is next to a road but not even a car passes. Just sounds of nature. I recommend it! In every walk through nature, you receive much more than you are looking for. John Muir Please take care of her, let's be clean.

title: (24100) Villablino - 1 Calle Cantina
description: Parking to be able to make greenway Laciana cicloturista route and the vega del palo.

title: (24100) Villablino - 1 Calle Cuetonidio
description: Laundry very close to the parking lot. Very well prepared. 10kg and 20kg washing machines, dryers and the possibility of ironing. The owner is a charm and knows the area very well.

title: (33737) Castro - 2A Aldea Castro
description: Pequeño lugar con mesa y banco muy cerca del Castro Chao de San Martín

title: (24100) Villablino - 36B Avenida Constantino Gancedo
description: Public and free parking at the Villablino sports center. It's pretty balanced and the night is almost empty. In front of a supermarket and near several bars and restaurants. Without service

title: (33727) - AS-35
description: "Recreational area" with wooden tables, water and barbecues. Very nice view, calm, just the sound of cows and sheep. We had a very pleasant evening, night and morning. It is possible to swim in the river about 10 minutes away.

title: (24100) Villablino - 18 Calle García Buelta
description: Downtown parking

title: (33731) Illano - AS-12
description: Motorhome area of Illano, beautiful place for hiking.

title: (33785) San Pedro de Paredes - s/n Calle Trevías
title_short: (33785) San Pedro de Paredes - s/n Calle Trevías
description: Picnic area VERY cared for by the owner of La Casa del Obispo (San Pedro de Paredes bar). It is a very quiet area with 4 picnic tables that offers the possibility of spending the night (without taking out awnings or gear and always respecting the area). In addition, the town center is the starting point for the Esva sickle route (15km). HIGHLY recommended place.

title: (33727) Castrillón - AS-35
description: Nice place to spend the day, you can not spend the night, it has tables, benches, trampoline, ideal for bathing, small and uneven parking

title: (24140) Villablino - Unnamed Road
description: Arrival by passable dirt track, although with care in some areas. Viewpoint to the Laguna del Castro, we can see birds, amphibians and even the brown bear.

title: (24429) Peranzanes - LE-4212
description: Parking next to a recreational area on the outskirts of Chano with a bathing area. In the village there is a bar with wifi and nearby are the famous pallozas. Very well-kept and quiet place.

title: (33826) - 152A Lugar Villabre
description: On the side of a road where no one ever seems to pass by except for Calvin the cow and his mates. Absolute tranquility. Beautiful view. No houses in sight. Perfect when on the road, but no water, bins, tables or whatever. Enjoy!

title: (33717) Villayón - 209B Lugar Villayon
description: Rest area for trucks. We have spent the night without any problem. Picnic tables on grass. Garbage container

title: (33840) Saliencia - 102A Lugar Saliencia
description: Parking very quiet slope to spend the night

name: Camping La Zarapica
title: (24495) Camping La Zarapica
description: Newly created campsite, a magical place without tourist exploitation, ideal for families and pets.

address.street: Carretera Palacios del Sil - Salientes s/n

title: (24495) Palacios del Sil - 15 Calle Calvo Sotelo
title_short: (24495) Palacios del Sil - 15 Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Space and shade at the end of this road, great swimming under the bridge. recreation area across the bridge below. You have to park on the flat

title: (24140) Villaseca de Laciana - 130 Lugar Villaseca Lacia
title_short: (24140) Villaseca de Laciana - 130 Lugar Villaseca Lacia
description: Parking of the brewery 12 70, offers a visit to the factory for a fee with tasting of beers. It is slightly inclined but there are areas that do not, from here there are very beautiful excursions.

title: (33777) Villarquille - 2A Lugar Villarquille
description: Picnic site with tables, next to the country house museum "Marcos's house. A fountain that does not work. Shaded. There is a telephone and Internet signal with H. Nearby there is a chapel.

title: (24495) Palacios del Sil -
description: It is a place with picnic tables in the middle of the forest. It can be accessed by a dirt road. Not possible for AC, only vans. The dirt road is quite narrow but passable. In June there are a lot of mosquitoes here.

title: (33717) Oneta - 33A Lugar Oneta
description: Parking lot to visit the waterfalls of Oneta. Easily accessible via the as25 towards Villayón and then the (slightly narrower) as36 towards Oneta. Beautiful waterfalls, easily accessible via indicated route. Recommended!

title: (33717) - 40A Lugar Oneta
description: Departure for a walk to beautiful waterfall, no parking yet but in forecast in 1 year after the bartender very friendly. No terminal either. Extra for the day.

title: (24140) Villaseca de Laciana - 22 Calle Conxial
description: Parking of the swimming pool of a small and pretty town with the possibility of spending the night without problems. Nice waterfall towards Lumajo. Do not remove awnings etc. Much quieter than Villablino

title: (33869) Salas - 10 Avenida del Llaniello
description:
Free area with 8 seats, located next to the school area and 900m from the center.
It has an area for emptying gray and black water, and filling with drinking water.
They plan to open on 8/25/23, although it can already be used.
At the moment it does not have light points.

title: (27115) A Fonsagrada - LU-P-1910
description: Viewpoint with tables and benches with excellent views of the Navia river separating Asturias and Galicia, you can go up to the viewpoint itself with the car but you cannot spend the night. It does not have bins, therefore you have to be responsible with waste.

title: (33860) Salas - Av. del Llaniello
description: The population is SALAS. We have spent one night there. It is a car park near the school, at night there is no one because all the cars have left, they only come to bring their children to school, it is a very quiet place five minutes from the town center.

title: (33860) Salas - 8 Urbanización la Pomarada
description: Right in front of the municipal hostel and close to the center, just to park and spend the night. quiet site

title: (33777) San Martín de Oscos - 218A Poblado San Martin de Oscos
title_short: (33777) San Martín de Oscos - 218A Poblado San Martin de Oscos
description: Rest area next to the road. With a couple of tables to eat.

title: (33720) Llaviada - 1A Caserio Llaviada
description: Space opened in September 2016 Next to the football field.

title: (33111) La Plaza - 251 AS-265
description: Parking services. Quiet near the village of San Martin, all shops. Banks. prehistoric park at 3 km. Local bus parks here overnight and is quite noisy when setting off at 7am. Pleasant bars, cafés and restaurants. Beautifully cooked wild boar in a place near the top of the town.

title: (33111) Entrago - 14 Plaza Industrial Entrago
description: Area with load and discharge of water. You cannot stay overnight. Ideal to start the Senda del Oso route.

title: (24142) Cabrillanes - Unnamed Road
description: End of the road that leads to Lago Grande de Lago de Babia. There are no services and only room for three or four vans or AC, but it is a paradise, the perfect place to enjoy the mountains. Of course, in summer, because in winter it is all snowy and the road is narrow ...

title: (33777) Asturias - 150A Parque San Martin de Oscos
title_short: (33777) Asturias - 150A Parque San Martin de Oscos
description: Loading / unloading area for motorhomes.

title: (33111) San Martín - 1 Plaza la Paz
description: It offers a shower and a laundry service. We couldn't use it as we saw it on the last day, but interesting if you go by van.

title: (33111) Entrago - 3 Senda del Oso
description: Parking at the beginning of the Bear Greenway.

title: (33717) Brañúas -
description: A unique place next to the mountain road with beautiful views to stop and eat. I don't even think anyone would go up here to tell you that it can't be done

name: Camping La Cascada
title: (33718) Camping La Cascada
description: Beautiful campsite, old but clean sanitary facilities.

title: (33718) Villayón - Unnamed Road
description: Peaceful place on the edge of the Arbon reservoir for a picnic break or to sleep there. In addition to that there is a pier for those who have a canoe / kayak / paddle. There is a tap, a few flat places or very little inclined. No trash cans, please bring your trash.

title: (33718) Vivedro - 4A Lugar Vivedro
description: Quiet place next to the Arbon reservoir, very close to the road, overlooking the marsh and very close to the Oneta waterfall.

title: (33780) Trevías - n3 Calle de Jesús Peláez
title_short: (33780) Trevías - n3 Calle de Jesús Peláez
description: Perfect place to rest without noise. The parking and overnight area is next to the soccer field and the school. There are no spaces for ACs, they are shared with the cars. In the town there are bars, restaurants, supermarket and bakeries. Hiking and mountain biking routes.

title: (33776) Ferreira - 7 Lugar Ferreira
description: Level parking next to a road without any traffic. Near area to bathe with WC and in summer they rent canoes. Starting point for many excursions, very peaceful area. Recommended to spend a night and be woken up by the song of the nightingales. Be careful, cars over 7 meters in length may have difficulty turning around the roundabout where it ends.

title: (33784) - VA-4
description: Nice rest area, Good place to eat.

title: (33729) Vega de Ouria -
description: Fairly flat parking next to the Pena Queimada recreational area. Area with tables, drinking fountain and container. Very quiet, in the middle of nature, with spectacular views and only 5km from the town of Boal where all services are available and a motorhome area with a water point and deposit discharge. Also a wonderful place from which to start various hiking trails. As a negative point, the access road is not in very good condition. If you go through this area you will not regret it, but please, respect the space and collect the garbage.

title: (33111) Cébrano - Unnamed Road
description: Located in the sanctuary of Cebrano. Nice and quiet place. Next to the Art trail. There is a fountain and toilets.

title: (33718) Trelles - 112 Lugar Trelles
description: Trelles Recreation Area. Quiet area, near a small road but very quiet. Tables, drinking fountain, bbq, shades. Good access for van and AC

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 9322 Lugar Diseminado
description: Leisure area with tables already covered. There is no service, but there is fairly flat ground floor parking and it is a quiet and beautiful location next to a river. Ideal for the night.

title: (33799) Alto Penouta - AS-22
description: The Penauta park has a beautiful delimited forest to get lost in, with two picnic areas, viewpoints, both inland and along the coast, and dolmens. Small vans will be able to enter the forest area without much problem and even sleep next to the Pena Queimada Recreational Area. We have done it several times with the van. Although the stone and dirt path has more and more holes. For AC I would recommend staying at the entrance, next to the Penauta recreational area. You can park on the side of the small road that leads to the windmills. Now with the 6.5 meter AC we have been able to maneuver without much problem, but it is clear that there is no parking as such. You could also sleep here but the nearby presence of the windmills already gives a good idea of what the wind is blowing here. Be careful with the GPS because if you go from the coast the last section will put you on a complicated road. The best thing is to go to Boal or Rozadas and from there it already indicates you without problem.

title: (33840) León/ San Emiliano - SD-1
description: Alto de La Farrapona, ideal parking to sleep. During the day many cars to make the tour of the lakes. No services. Water in the fountains during the ascent. In September is the bellowing of the deer, you can hear it from your bed, quite a show. The night sky is a luxury, and the impressive sunsets. We were lucky to see a bear. Addendum: It seems that they have posted signs prohibiting overnight stays, and that the forest track on the León side has worsened. From the Asturias side it is paved.

title: (33797) Trelles -
description: Totally lonely spot by the river and lane bridge. Great for swimming or fishing. Only for vans or cars. There are two options to get there  - one direct approach is rocky and steep, the other (around the San Juan church) is less difficult but both are accesible without 4x4. Only one car. Be quiet and respect the nature. No littering!

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 6 Plaza el Valle
title_short: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 6 Plaza el Valle
description:
Parking in the village. It is a little inclined but in the last places it is not noticeable.
In the town there are bars, a bakery, a supermarket... There are garbage containers.
No prohibition signs. I spent a very quiet night.

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 38 CL-631
description: Picnic area with tables, fountain, barbecues. Swings. Panoramic view. Flat pitches shaded or sunny. Unfortunately poorly maintained, but acceptable. Quiet night, morning a little noise from 8:30 due to the trucks of the quarry but very bearable.

title: (33111) Fresnedo - TE-5
description: Small car park at the foot of the road, next to a picnic area, near the beginning of the Route of Rock Paintings. Quite quiet area, with little influx of vehicles. We spent the night in the parking lot itself, although it is on a slope.

title: (33111) Fresnedo - 3 AS-228
description: Entrance to Cueva Huerta. Sloped parking for 10 vehicles, from where a path that connects with the prehistory park and the bear path starts. There are 5 picnic tables and beautiful views. Nearby are the Fresnedo rock paintings, in another picnic area.

title: (33776) Villanueva de Oscos - 6 AS-13
description: Motorhome area (gas station) in Villanueva de Oscos

title: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 4A Caserio Ferreirela
title_short: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 4A Caserio Ferreirela
description: Parking to go to the Marqués de Sargadelos Birthplace Museum where they do guided tours and in summer they offer workshops for children and adults.

title: (33777) Villanueva de Oscos - 48A Poblado Villanueva de Oscos
title_short: (33777) Villanueva de Oscos - 48A Poblado Villanueva de Oscos
description: Parking next to a sports center with public toilets, municipal swimming pool with toilets and showers and a children's playground. in the middle of town, very quiet. Start of a multitude of routes through forests.

title: (33858) Salas - AS-15
description: Parking rest next to the road with a suspension bridge and a very nice river, a gas station ahead

title: (33796) - 5A Caserio Teijedo
description: San Roque rest area. Picnic tables and barbecues available, shaded. If the 2 flat spaces are taken, there is a third flat space in front of the chapel. Isolated location, easy access in dry weather. No services.

title: (33776) Bustapena - AS-13
description: Small car park/picnic area along the road. Occasional traffic. Unfortunately a lot of rubbish, but fine for one night. Place for a few small and especially low camper vans. Only those can be a little further from the road.

title: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 75A Lugar Santa Eulalia de Oscos
title_short: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 75A Lugar Santa Eulalia de Oscos
description: Recreational area with views and picnic tables

title: (33791) - Autovía del Cantábrico
description: Parking behind the restaurant where the truck drivers park. huge lot with the A8 behind but don't bother at night. no service. but very quiet.

title: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 64A Lugar Santa Eulalia de Oscos
title_short: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 64A Lugar Santa Eulalia de Oscos
description: Next to the sports center of Santa Eulalia de Oscos. 100 meters from the center of the village. Parking of about 15 places shared with other vehicles, flat. Beautiful village with a beautiful church and possibility of hiking trails.

title: (33858) Casas del Puente - AS-15
description: In the countryside, the murmur of the river, the possibility of bathing, ideal for spending a quiet night.

title: (33707) - 30 Avenida Argentina
description: Quiet site on the outskirts of Luarca. there is no shade or any kind of services.

title: (27652) Rao - LE-4211
description: Picnic lookout. Parking for several cars. 1669m.

title: (33114) Proaza - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful view of the valley and the mountains, on the road that leads to Bandujo.

title: (33787) Valdés - 200 Carretera Nacional 634
description: Picnic area, with tables, bbq, water.

title: (33700) Asturias - 5 Avenida Argentina
description: Free parking

title: (33700) Raicedo - 17 Avenida Estación
description: Parking at the train station for 3 campers. Stress-free parking to visit Luarca. 15 minutes on foot.

title: (33700) Luarca - 14 Avenida Estación
description:
motorhome area with all services and barbecues
next to the Luarca train station
 
parking on grass

title: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 1A Caserio Millarado
title_short: (33776) Santa Eulalia de Oscos - 1A Caserio Millarado
description: Recreation area of Millarado. Near Santa Eulalia de Oscos. Quiet place with a beautiful view. In nature and hiking. Flat parking, fountain, tables and bathrooms with shower (open when we went), take care of it.

title: (33776) Pumares - 9 Caserio Pumares
description: Public parking next to a recreation area with barbecue tables. Beginning of several hiking trails, cascading waterfall of Saimeira, beautiful place

title: (33791) Canedo - La Mata, s/n
description: Small park very close to Parque de la Vida. There are two wooden tables, some swings, a small stage and pretty plane maple trees that provide shade on the sides of the little park. There are neighboring houses so it is not the best option to sleep, but my partner and I cooked and ate at one of the tables. we were alone and very quiet. a neighbor greeted us kindly.

title: (33791) - La Mata
description: Parking in a meadow adjoining the Parque de la Vida, theme park. Level ground. We have slept alone and in complete silence. There is a railway next to it but no trains pass at night. Phenomenal. Please don't nobody go camping. There are nearby houses.

title: (33700) Luarca - 23 Avenida de Galicia
description: DO laundry

title: (33795) Coaña - 15 Lugar Villacondide
description: Parking of the Interpretation Area of Castro de Coaña

title: (24142) Mena de Babia - 12 Camino Monte
description: Picnic area in Mena de Babia. Tables, barbecue spot, children playground, water tap and natural swimmingpoll. Very beautiful and quiet spot.

title: (33776) Penacova -
description: Belle esplanade tranquille accessible par un chemin roulant. Très belle vue.

title: (33857) Salas - 3 N-634
description: Quiet place, with picnic tables. There is a "chiringuito" bar in the same place with a basic bathroom. When I arrived there was a parked van that had passed the night without any problem. The only area that cannot be overnight is the area that is flooded near the river. In the area there is no service but the town is a few minutes away.

name: Camping Valle de Ancares
title: (24433) Camping Valle de Ancares
description:
✅ ANCARES VALLEY CAMPING
 
The location is great: it is a green space full of trees that belongs to a UNESCO biosphere reserve and on the banks of the Cuiña river, all within a short walk from the small village of Pereda de Ancares.
If you travel with the intention of spending serene nights of rest, you should book a stay at this mountain campsite in the Sierra de Ancares, as it enjoys a quiet environment conducive to rest and outdoor activities.
The campsite has the Active Tourism company "Ancares Activa" that will offer you the best of adventures!
Less than 1 minute walking we will have the soccer and basketball courts. The months of July and August have a municipal pool!

title: (33700) Luarca - 18 Calle Rivero
description: In the port of the town. Poster at the entrance of maximum 48 hours.

title: (33700) Luarca - 45D Barrio Pescadería
description: Parking for small vans only (we are a T2). Short spaces and access via narrow road. View of the sea and close to town centre. We did not stay the night but no prohibition signs visible

title: (33793) Hervedosas - Autovía del Cantábrico
description: Spring water. Clean water. And a large roadside trash can.

title: (33700) Luarca - Av. Nené Losada Rico
description: Big parking at the school carpark. No sign of restriction. No service. Oposite there is a swimming pool.

title: (33787) - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the woods on a track 100 meters after the end of the road. Only for van because narrow track, only one seat or 2 vans one behind the other, otherwise there is another location 50 meters away by turning right at the fork in the track. The only downside is that pine resin flavored my beer!

title: (33700) Luarca -
description: Parking area on the beach of Luarca. At night the baths on the beach close. There is a beach bar, showers on the beach and a drinking fountain.

name: Camping Playa de Otur
title: (33792) Camping Playa de Otur
description:
, N-634.
"Playa de Otur", Small quiet campsite, well kept, shaded and flowery, not overcrowded. 300/400 m from a beautiful, not too busy beach. Free Wifi and computers available. Shop and snacks at reception. Concerts and children's entertainment once or twice a week.

title: (33787) Caroyas - N 634
description: It is a parking lot of the La Panera restaurant, speaking with the owner there is no problem staying overnight. I would appreciate some expense. I just ate and it is a very good place to have lunch or dinner.

title: (33700) Luarca - 7 VA-1
description:
Small cars only!

5 free parking spaces facing the sea next to a small chapel with views. Impressive at 360 *. The ground is slightly inclined on the left but nice for a break to see to spend a night. A big steep climb just before arriving there, this view is worth it.

title: (33787) - N-634
description: Quiet parking. The beach by way of 5-10 minutes. No special services. Only for littering. On beach there is bathroom, showers and pool bar in summer.

name: Camping Playa de Taurán Asturias
title: (33700) Camping Playa de Taurán Asturias
description: Camping Taurán. Small campsite very quiet and ecological at the end of the road. Beautiful views of the coast.

title: (33719) Navia - 306 Lugar Salcedo
description: Water tap on the side of the service station. Nobody challenged so assumed to be free.

title: (33792) Sabugo - 764 Carretera de la Playa
description: Last possibility to park with a large camper before the road descends with a gradient of 18 percent. nice view. not flat, but you are standing on a beautiful green meadow. it did smell like cow dung, but that is in more places. a short walk from the beach, where you can also surf. there seems to be a restaurant, but it was closed.

title: (33787) Cueva - N-634
description: Small beach with parking and snack. Very calm and few people. Ideal for picnics, swimming. For small motorhome or van because the road is narrow.

title: (33783) Quintana - N-632
description: Parking, EESS, water recharge, bakery, FOOD TRUCK with delicious burgers!

title: (33778) - 1A Caserio Aguillon
description: 2 car parks at the start of the short hike to the Cioyo waterfall. Quiet and flat. Magnificent waterfall.

title: (33792) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking Barayo beach, nature reserve. Very quiet to spend the night. A walk takes you to an amazing beach. No services

title: (24433) Candín - LE-3203
description: Outside Piornedo wide site on the border between León and Galicia, a short walk from the town and surrounded by nature

title: (24143) Huergas de Babia - 2 Camino Riolago
description: Motorhome parking area, in the Natural Park of Babia and Luna, a magical setting to enjoy Montihuero, Ubiña rock, Green Lagoon, Lagoon river Chao Sil Moon sources, the reservoir of Barrios de Luna and innumerable corners where time will make you dream.

title: (33789) Querúas - Unnamed Road
description: Spectacular place for small vans with difficult access, super quiet to pecnote in the middle of nature and 50mt from Santa Ana beach

title: (33789) San Cristobal -
description: Viewpoint on the cliffs, wooden picnic table, access on foot to the estaca beach

title: (33793) Navia - Unnamed Road
description: Barayo beach parking, quite spacious, good views, it is at the top of the mountain, 30 minutes from the beach walking through two marked trails, picnic area, no other services, we only stayed one afternoon, but it does not present problems for spend the night.

title: (33789) Querúas - Unnamed Road
description: Small very nice place for a lunch break or a night. on the edge of a cliff. no services. attention not accessible for motorhomes. dirt road, uneven pebbles. no direct view of the cliffs.

title: (33710) Navia - 201 Lugar Villalonga
description: Ground parking for AC indicated. Front Civil Guard of the population. Very calm.

title: (33710) Navia - 8 Avenida del Pardo
description: WASH UP self-service laundry. 3 washing machines (12kg, 15kg and 20kg).

title: (33789) - Unnamed Road
description: If you like seclusion and a beautiful view of the ocean. Parking just before Cabo Busto. Bad GPS coordinates, take the other parking nearby.

title: (33719) Navia - 1 Carretera de Andes
description: Functioning public water fountain with 2 taps in very good condition. Several parking spots in front of it.
